subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Alabama teammates D. J. Hall and Wallace Gilberry were among four rookie free agents signed by the Giants, who also signed defensive end Antonio Reynolds of Tennessee and safety Nehemiah Warrick of Michigan State. A four-year starter at wide receiver, Hall had a career-high 67 receptions for 1,005 yards and 6 touchdowns last season.
